@EnvAgencySE  are investigating a possible natural reduction in oxygen levels affecting #fish in lakes at Albourne in #WestSussex. Our officers are working with the local angling club to improve conditions in the water. If you see fish in distress,  please call us on 0800 807060. https://t.co/fjsiloBcZr

Do you know what to do in a flood? If you have a flood alert in your area, you should ensure you pack medicines and insurance documents and visit the flood warning information service here: https://t.co/ABQ8OhZTn5 @EnvAgencyAnglia #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/I7BWhBx8kG

text: @EnvAgencyYNE Run and don't drive through flood water 💦, 🙄

@EnvAgency I tend to get the waders out. 

..but then a150yr old dwelling, built in the middle of a flood plain, has a raised floor and keeps its occupants dry...we just wait until the water recedes. https://t.co/krA8hMMQhD
